_source.text: Accompanied by a cast of pros from New Orleans and Memphis, including Meters bassist George Porter Jr., pianist David Torkanowsky, drummer Raymond Weber and guitarist Michael Toles, Irma takes her time and belts with majestic power on a program of soul-drenched ballads like "Cried Too Long" and the gospel-flavored "Hold Me While I Cry" and upbeat old school numbers like "Love Don't Get No Better Than This."

text: Accompanied by a cast of pros from **New** **Orleans** and Memphis, including Meters bassist George Porter Jr., pianist David Torkanowsky, drummer Raymond Weber and guitarist **Michael** Toles, Irma takes her time and belts with majestic power on a program of soul-drenched ballads like "Cried Too Long" and the gospel-flavored "Hold Me While I Cry" and upbeat old school numbers like "Love Don't Get No **Better** **Than** This."
